text: Aur yaad kero jabkay hum ney aap say farma diya kay aap kay rab ney logon ko gher liya hai. Jo roya (any royat) hum ney aap ko dikhaee thi woh logon kay liye saaf aazmaeesh hi thi aur issi tarah woh darakht bhi jiss say quran mein izhar-e-nafrat kiya gaya hai. Hum unehn dara rahey hain lekin yeh unhen aur bari sirkashi mein barha raha hai
